opp.PhysicalTrainUnitIdentifier.description: Defines a set of possible identifiers for a physical train (ETCS-trainRunningNumber, OBU-ID etc).

trainRunningNumber.description: Defines the Train Running Number for ETCS same as SS026.NID_OPERATIONAL. To be usable for ETCS must contain a decimal number [0..99999999]. Mapping to uint32 by filling with F: '1233' -> 0x1233FFFF

additionalTrainRunningNumber.description: Defines the distinction between Operational Train Units with the same trainRunningNumber. This may occur if a trainRunningNumber is reused for different spare trains.

tafTapTsiTrainID.description: refers to taf tap tsi train id

leadingOnBoardUnitId.description: Defines NID_ENGINE. To be usable with ETCS must contain a decimal number [0..16.777.215]

opp.OperationalTrainCategory.description: Defines usage category for an OperationalTrain

description.description: Defines the description for the operational train categoryfor UI-purposes

trainUsage.description: Defines the train usage type for UI-purposes

opp.OnBoardExtension.description: A container class for a non-standard key-value-property. Messages need sometimes IM-specific information.

contentType.description: Defines the key-attribute in a key-value-pair. Used for annotation of IM-specific onboard-equipment

content.description: Defines the value-attribute in a key-value-pair. Used for annotation of IM-specific onboard-equipment

opp.SupportedOnBoardEquipment.description: Defines Onboard equipment installed and active on a train

trainProtectionType.description: Defines the train protection type supported by the on board equipment

etcsSystemVersions.description: Defines the supported etcs system versions

opp.OperationalConsist.description: Defines a rolling-stock consist unit identified by the installed onboard equipment.

supportedOnBoardEquipment.description: Defines the list of supported onboard equipment for an operational consist

opp.TrainUnit.description: Defines rolling stock, which is used to implement part of a train movement.

physicalTrainUnit.description: Defines the physical train unit to be used in Plan Execution user interface of Workbench (fallback level for TMS)

operationalTrainCategory.description: Defines the category type for the train in operational plan. To be used inPlan Execution user interface of Workbench (fallback level for TMS)

operationalConsists.description: Defines operational consists building the TrainUnit starting from the train-head.

nominalRotatingMass.description: Defines the nominal rotating mass of the train,special value 0=unknown

regularBrakeWeightPercentage.description: Defines the regular brake weight percentage. Use 0 if undefined

emergencyBrakeWeightPercentage.description: Defines the emergency brake weight percentage. Use zero if undefined

brakePosition.description: Defines the active brake position for the train

brakeModelType.description: Defines the applicable brake model type for the train

atoGradeAutomation.description: Defines the ato grade of automation for the train

scheduledTrainLength.description: Defines the scheduled train length in meters

infra.NetPointReference.description: Represents a point reference in the network.

hasTopoCoordinate.description: Defines the topological coordinate of a network point reference

appliesToDirection.description: The direction relative to the origin of the linear element towards the point reference applies

opp.TrainUnitActivity.description: Defines, what happens with the rolling stock at this location.

trainUnitActivityType.description: Defines the train unit activity type

actualTrainUnitIndex.description: Defines the index of TrainUnit in OperationalMovement. operationalTrainUnits before the activity

targetTrainUnitIndex.description: Defines the index of TrainUnit in OperationalMovement. operationalTrainUnits after the activity

opp.DoorActivity.description: Defines which doors shall be open and how they shall be open.

openingDoorSide.description: Defines the door opening side. noneSide if the doors are kept closed.noneSide if the doors are kept closed

centralisedOpening.description: Defines if the doors can be centrally opened. true - centralised opening, false - opening by passengers/driver

automaticClosing.description: Defines if automatic closing of doors is performed by ATO or not. True by ATO, false - without ATO

opp.AdditionalEventTime.description: Definestimes not required for ATO, but useful for CDAS (e.g. published arrival, plannedArrival etc.)

timeValue.description: Defines the time value in UTC

timeType.description: Defines the time type for a stop description

opp.StopDescription.description: Defines activities to be implemented by the train when it stopps.

trainUnitActivities.description: Defines the sequence of changes of TrainUnit during the stop

doorActivity.description: Defines the door activity. If the attribute is not provided, the doors remain closed

relaxedCoupler.description: Defines the state of coupler. true - request for coupler relaxation, false -not, see Q_Relaxed_Coupler in SS126

holdTrain.description: Defines, that if the train shall be hold until the next update. See JP in SS126

scheduledDeparture.description: Defines the scheduled departure time. see departure in SS126. In the last station it is 'end of mission', in UTC.

scheduledMinDwellTime.description: Defines if the train has to wait after actual arrival this number of seconds before departure. ActualEarliestDeparture = max(departure, arrival + minDwellTime) will be calculated by ATO-OB, see minDwellTime in SS126

additionalEventTimes.description: Defines the state of coupler. true - request for coupler relaxation, false -not, see Q_Relaxed_Coupler in SS126

opp.MovementEvent.description: Defines an operational activity on a specific point in space and time for a train run.

id.description: Defines the Identity of the object; used for referencing

plannedType.description: Defines if stop or pass was planned

scheduledType.description: Defines if stop or pass is scheduled

alignment.description: Defines the train-alignment at position (head, center, end)

position.description: Defines position on a linearElement for the movement event

pathToNextEvent.description: Defines the path-part after the LinearElement of the position-value and beforethe linear element of the nextEvent (excluding). The path must be reconstructable without graph-search algorithms.

stopDescription.description: Defines the stop description in case of a stop of the train

scheduledArrival.description: Defines the scheduled arrival time. equal to scheduledDeparture for a passing train, see latestArrival inSS126. In the first station it is time of 'start of mission', in UTC

scheduledArrivalWindow.description: Defines the scheduled arrival window. scheduledEaliestArrival = scheduledArrival - scheduledArrivalWindow. For passing trains scheduledEarliestDeparture = scheduledEarliestArrival, see arrivalWindow in SS126. In the first station it is a time window for 'start of mission'.

startsAfterEvents.description: Defines the set of operational events, which must be finished before the current event starts.

dpsGroups.description: Defines the list of DPS Groups

opp.SpecificMovementRestriction.description: Defines single aspect of the train specific restriction

adhesionCategory.description: Defines the different adhesion categories applicable for the train as per track conditions

maxCurrent.description: Defines max current value, s. item 0.33 in SS126

atoInhibition.description: train section is not contantly monitored, or stimulate driver's attention, or approaching overcrouded station

dasInhibition.description: Defines the Driver advisory system inhibition zone

excludedDPSGroupsForFlankProtection.description: Defines the list of DPSGroups to be excluded from flank protection calculation.

opp.MovementRestriction.description: Defines train specific restriction along its path.

restrictedPath.description: Defines the restricted path associated to a restriction of on an operational plan movement

specificRestriction.description: Defines the specific restriction active on the restriction path associated to an operational plan movement

opp.OperationalPlanMovement.description: Defines a train run with a dedicated train number.

id.description: Defines the Identity of the object; used for referencing

issuedAt.description: Defines the issue-point in time with microsecond-precision builds a version-id for acknowledgements and validity-estimations, in UTC

configurationDataVersionRef.description: Defines the configuration data version for which the operational plan is valid

includesEndOfJourney.description: Defines if the operational plan movement include the end of journey. if true, the movementEvents contains entire remaining path including the end position, otherwise the journey will continue after the last movementEvent of this object

operationalTrainUnits.description: Defines the set of train units, which are active during some paths of the train movement. The same train unit can be used in not connected parts of the path

movementEvents.description: Defines times/operational activities sequence along the movement

movementRestrictions.description: Defines train specific restrictions, which are active along its path-sections

infra.LinearElementSection.description: Defines a directed linear object (with a linear extension) located on a LinearElement

startOffsetFromOrigin.description: Defines the start offset from the origin

endOffsetFromOrigin.description: Defines the end offset from the origin

appliesInBothDirections.description: Defines if the section applies in both directions

opp.TrainGroupSpec.description: Defines the train aspects, which define if the train belongs to the restricted group.

axleLoadCategories.description: Trains with the listed Axle-Load-Category belong to the TrainGroup.

cantDeficiencyCategories.description: Defines the different cant deficiency categories

restrictionEndsAtTrainFront.description: normally false, but for disturbed level crossings, the train can accelerate as soon as the train-front passed the level crossing. In this case should be true

opp.RestrictedAspect.description: Defines single aspects of the infrastructure restriction

nonStopping.description: Defines the non stopping area. if true, the trains defined in trainGroupSpec shall not stop within restriction area

trackClosure.description: Defines track closure information. If true, the trains defined in trainGroupSpec shall not enter restriction area

operationalRadioHole.description: Defines the presence of operational radio holes. if true radio communication is restricted within restriction area

atoInhibition.description: Defined the ato inhibition zones. Exmaples: train section is not contantly monitored, or stimulate driver's attention, or approaching overcrouded station

maxCurrent.description: Defines max current value. For ATO, SS126. Ignored by TrafficCS

opp.SpecificRestriction.description: Defines single aspect of the infrastructure restriction.

appliedToTrains.description: Defines the applicable trains that are affected by the specific restriction

restrictedAspects.description: Defines the restricted aspects associated to a specific restriction

opp.RestrictionArea.description: Defines a topological area, in which the restrictions must be applied.

specificRestrictions.description: Defines the list of specific restrictions

opp.RestrictionEvent.description: Defines a part of temporary infrastructure restriction, especially if one Restriction plan contains several areas to be activate to different times.

id.description: Defines the Identity of the object; used for referencing

creationTime.description: Defines the time when the restrictionArea shall be created=implemented=activated in interlocking, in UTC

removalTime.description: Defines the removal time in UTC. E.g. removal 10:04:20 means, that restriction is active until 10:04:19.999999. The relation is creationTime <= active < removalTime

restrictionArea.description: Defines the restriction area associated to a restriction event

startsAfterEvents.description: Defines the set of operational events, which must be finished before the current event starts.

issuedAt.description: Defines the issue-point in time with microsecond-precision builds a version-id for acknowledgements and validity-estimations, in UTC

configurationDataVersionRef.description: Defines the configuration data version for which the operational plan is valid

restrictionEvents.description: Defines a set of restriction events assigned the the operational plan restriction

infra.TopologicalCoordinate.description: Defines a topological coordinate on the track

infra.NetLinearReference.description: Defines a linked path on the topology

startsAt.description: Definesthe starting coordinate of a linear reference

endsAt.description: Defines the ending coordinate of a linear reference.

hasSequence.description: Defines a sequence of linearElements from the start to the end excluding those defined in startAt- and endsAt-TopologicalCoodinates.

infra.NetAreaReference.description: Represents an area reference in the network.

includes.description: List of linear references included in an network area reference.

opp.WarningDevice.description: Defines functional warning device which must be activated to implement warning measure

id.description: Defines the Identity of the object; used for referencing

deviceType.description: Defines a functional warning device type used for securing the warning area

opp.WarningArea.description: Defines area in which Warning measures shall be implemented.

warningDevices.description: Defines the list of warning devices

opp.OperationalEventRef.description: Defines a reference to one of possible OperationalEvents (as a unit)

movementEvent.description: refers a movement event including the movement plan

restrictionEvent.description: Refers a restriction event including restriction plan

warningMeasureEvent.description: Refers a warnning measure event including the warning plan

opp.WarningMeasureEvent.description: Defines planned activation/removal of warning area

id.description: Defines the Identity of the object; used for referencing

creationTime.description: Defines the time when the warningArea shall be created=implemented=activated in interlocking, in UTC

removalTime.description: Defines the removal time in UTC

startsAfterEvents.description: Defines the set of operational events, which must be finished before the current event starts.

opp.OperationalPlanWarningMeasure.description: Defines a temporary warning area, required for e.g. a possession.

issuedAt.description: Defines the issue-point in time with microsecond-precision builds a version-id for acknowledgements and validity-estimations, in UTC

configurationDataVersionRef.description: Defines the configuration data version for which the operational plan is valid

warningMeasureEvents.description: Defines the list of warning measures events
